name: Shreya Karkun
summary: Researcher in speech production and medical imaging (rtMRI, EMA) focusing on co‑articulation, tongue shape variability, articulatory symmetry, and velum dynamics. Aspiring PhD candidate with strong technical background in signal processing and machine learning.
elevator_pitch: Research Associate @ IISc SPIRE Lab • Speech Production, rtMRI & EMA • Building tools that reveal how we speak • Pursuing PhD in Speech Science & Technology.
